class Solution(object):
    def minimumOperations(self, nums, target):
        """
        :type nums: List[int]
        :type target: List[int]
        :rtype: int
        """
        n = len(nums)
        ds = [nums[i]-target[i] for i in range(n)]
        print ds
        r = abs(ds[0])
        d = ds[0]
        for i in range(1, n):
            v = ds[i]
            if v==0: d=0
            elif v>0:
                if d<0: d=0
                if v>=d:
                    r+=(v-d)
                d = v
            else:
                if d>0: d=0
                if v<=d:
                    r+=d-v
                d=v
        return r
